Issues.Title: Infinite hang when an added TreeNode forms a recursive hierarchy
Issues.Body:
* .NET Core Version: 3.0.100-preview-009812
* Have you experienced this same bug with .NET Framework? Yes

**Problem description:** A typo caused the wrong node to be added while constructing a hierarchy, causing a hang that was difficult to spot.

**Actual behavior:** Infinite hang in this loop:

https://github.com/dotnet/winforms/blob/fa4cdb0f50f8a64044a9d2baa192c53f6326f3e9/src/System.Windows.Forms/src/System/Windows/Forms/TreeNode.cs#L1575-L1576

```
System.Windows.Forms.dll!System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.FindTreeView()
System.Windows.Forms.dll!System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.TreeView.get()
System.Windows.Forms.dll!System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Realize(bool insertFirst)
System.Windows.Forms.dll!System.Windows.Forms.TreeNodeCollection.AddInternal(System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode node, int delta)
System.Windows.Forms.dll!System.Windows.Forms.TreeNodeCollection.Add(System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode node)	
```

**Expected behavior:** Just like the `Control.Controls` hierarchy, an exception should be thrown explaining that a TreeNode cannot be added as a descendant of itself.

**Minimal repro:**

```cs
var node = new TreeNode();
node.Nodes.Add(node); // Infinite hang
```
Issues.RelatedDescription: Open issue "Infinite hang when an added TreeNode forms a recursive hierarchy" (#358)

Issues.Title: Fully-themed controls
Issues.Body:
If you want to obtain a native look and feel in your projects, you currently have to redo minor implementations over and over to obtain these effects:

- Getting the fade effects on some common controls (Buttons, Checkboxes, Radiobuttons, Textboxes, Comboboxes)
- Getting images working on Buttons while preserving fade effects
- Getting the fade effects on Toolbars
- Getting the new theming on MainMenus and ContextMenus
- Getting CommandLinks and SplitButtons
- Getting different colored Progressbars
- Getting the explorer-like interface for ListBoxes and TreeViews 

Articles like this one explain how: https://www.codeproject.com/Articles/18858/Fully-themed-Windows-Vista-Controls (has images)

Would you consider including some or all of these upgrades in the box? I'm willing to contribute.
Issues.RelatedDescription: Open issue "Fully-themed controls" (#357)
